job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Engineer, Full Stack - AI
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Join our dynamic AI team and be at the forefront of innovation. Our mission is to rapidly develop new ideas, collaborate with customers and partners for evaluation, and seamlessly integrate these solutions into our products. This role offers a unique opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI technologies and access invaluable process data through our advanced engine.

   We aim to help our clients achieve streamlined processes faster using AI and leverage the collected data to optimize these processes to the highest degree. This position is perfect for someone passionate about AI, eager to make an impact, and looking to grow with a team dedicated to excellence and innovation.

   In this role, you will play a crucial role in designing and developing the backend infrastructure that enables our enterprise customers to safely integrate AI solutions into their workflows. Your primary focus will be on creating a robust and scalable AI engine that ensures seamless data processing, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment.
     * Design and Develop AI Backend Infrastructure: Design, develop, test, and maintain the AI backend infrastructure, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security.
     * Integrate AI Models into Enterprise Systems: Integrate AI models with enterprise systems, ensuring seamless data exchange, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment.
     * Implement Data Security and Governance: Implement robust data security measures, including encryption, access controls, and auditing, to ensure the integrity of sensitive customer data.
     * Collaborate with Cross-Functional Teams: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and product managers, to ensure seamless integration of AI solutions into enterprise workflows.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer, Full Stack - AI

Join our dynamic AI team and be at the forefront of innovation. Our mission is to rapidly develop new ideas, collaborate with customers and partners for evaluation, and seamlessly integrate these solutions into our products. This role offers a unique opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI technologies and access invaluable process data through our advanced engine.

   We aim to help our clients achieve streamlined processes faster using AI and leverage the collected data to optimize these processes to the highest degree. This position is perfect for someone passionate about AI, eager to make an impact, and looking to grow with a team dedicated to excellence and innovation.

   In this role, you will play a crucial role in designing and developing the backend infrastructure that enables our enterprise customers to safely integrate AI solutions into their workflows. Your primary focus will be on creating a robust and scalable AI engine that ensures seamless data processing, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment.
     * Design and Develop AI Backend Infrastructure: Design, develop, test, and maintain the AI backend infrastructure, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security.
     * Integrate AI Models into Enterprise Systems: Integrate AI models with enterprise systems, ensuring seamless data exchange, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment.
     * Implement Data Security and Governance: Implement robust data security measures, including encryption, access controls, and auditing, to ensure the integrity of sensitive customer data.
     * Collaborate with Cross-Functional Teams: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and product managers, to ensure seamless integration of AI solutions into enterprise workflows.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing and developing backend infrastructure for AI solutions, integrating AI models into enterprise systems, and ensuring seamless data processing, secure storage, and efficient model deployment. It highlights working with AI engines and integrating AI models, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems powered by AI. While it mentions backend infrastructure and data processing, the primary focus is on the application and integration of AI models rather than core ML model development or data engineering in the traditional sense.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing and developing backend infrastructure, integrating AI models into enterprise systems, and ensuring scalability, reliability, and security, which are core software development activities for AI-powered applications.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and developing the backend infrastructure

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions designing, developing, testing, and maintaining the AI backend infrastructure, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and Develop AI Backend Infrastructure

job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI models with enterprise systems, ensuring data exchange, storage, and deployment are key software development tasks for AI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate AI Models into Enterprise Systems

job_tasks.justification: Implementing data security measures like encryption and access controls is a crucial aspect of secure software development, especially for enterprise AI solutions.

The role aims to help clients achieve streamlined processes faster using AI and leverage data to optimize these processes, indicating a need to understand business goals and translate them into AI solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: help our clients achieve streamlined processes faster using AI

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with customers and partners for evaluation and integrating solutions into products requires understanding business needs and market context.
job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with customers and partners for evaluation

job_tasks.justification: The job involves working with AI models and ensuring efficient model deployment, which is a part of the modeling lifecycle, even if the core model development is done by others.
Ensuring efficient model deployment and maintaining the AI engine for seamless data processing and storage touches upon operational aspects of AI systems.
The phrase 'seamlessly integrate these solutions into our products' points to the software development aspect of bringing AI capabilities into existing or new products.
job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate these solutions into our products

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on creating a robust and scalable AI engine, which is a software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: creating a robust and scalable AI engine

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring seamless data processing, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment are all critical components of developing and maintaining AI-powered backend systems.
job_tasks.phrase: seamless data processing, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly states the need to collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and product managers.

eager to make an impact, and looking to grow with a team dedicated to excellence and innovation
